019package org.jgrapes.util;
020
021import com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.Config;
022import com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.file.CommentedFileConfig;
023import java.io.File;
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.util.HashMap;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.Optional;
029import java.util.StringTokenizer;
030import java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException;
031import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
032import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
033import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
034import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
035import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialConfiguration;
036
037/**
038 * A base class for configuration stored based on the 
039 * [night config library](https://github.com/TheElectronWill/night-config).
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
042    "PMD.GodClass" })
043public abstract class NightConfigStore extends ConfigurationStore {
044
045    protected CommentedFileConfig config;
046
047    /**
048     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given 
049     * channel and the given file.
050     * 
051     * @param componentChannel the channel 
052     * @param file the file used to store the TOML
053     * @throws IOException
054     */
055    public NightConfigStore(Channel componentChannel, File file)
056            throws IOException {
057        this(componentChannel, file, true);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given 
062     * channel and the given file.
063     * 
064     * @param componentChannel the channel 
065     * @param file the file used to store the TOML
066     * @throws IOException
067     */
068    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
069    public NightConfigStore(Channel componentChannel, File file,
070            boolean update) throws IOException {
071        super(componentChannel);
072        if (update) {
073            Handler.Evaluator.add(this, "onConfigurationUpdate",
074                channel().defaultCriterion());
075        }
076        if (!file.exists()) {
077            file.createNewFile();
078        }
079        config = CommentedFileConfig.builder(file).sync().concurrent().build();
080        config.load();
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
085        "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop" })
086    public Optional<Map<String, Object>> structured(String path) {
087        if (!path.startsWith("/")) {
088            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Path must start with \"/\".");
089        }
090
091        // Walk down to node.
092        var segs = new StringTokenizer(path, "/");
093        Config cur = config;
094        while (segs.hasMoreTokens()) {
095            var nextSeg = segs.nextToken();
096            Object next = Optional.ofNullable(cur.get("_" + nextSeg))
097                .orElse(cur.get("/" + nextSeg));
098            if (next instanceof Config) {
099                cur = (Config) next;
100                continue;
101            }
102            return Optional.empty();
103        }
104        return Optional.of(toValueMap(cur));
105    }
106
107    private Map<String, Object> toValueMap(Config config) {
108        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
109        Map<String, Object> result = new HashMap<>();
110        for (var entry : config.entrySet()) {
111            if (isNode(entry.getKey())) {
112                continue;
113            }
114            if (entry.getValue() instanceof Config) {
115                result.put(entry.getKey(), toValueMap(entry.getValue()));
116                continue;
117            }
118            result.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
119        }
120        return result;
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Checks if the name is an entry for a node.
125     *
126     * @param name the name
127     * @return true, if is node
128     */
129    protected boolean isNode(String name) {
130        if (name == null || name.length() < 1) {
131            return false;
132        }
133        char first = name.charAt(0);
134        return first == '_' || first == '/';
135    }
136
137    /**
138     * Intercepts the {@link Start} event and fires a
139     * {@link ConfigurationUpdate} event.
140     *
141     * @param event the event
142     * @throws BackingStoreException the backing store exception
143     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
144     */
145    @Handler(priority = 999_999, channels = Channel.class)
146    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CognitiveComplexity")
147    public void onStart(Start event)
148            throws BackingStoreException, InterruptedException {
149        ConfigurationUpdate updEvt = new InitialConfiguration();
150        addPrefs(updEvt, "/", config);
151        newEventPipeline().fire(updEvt, event.channels()).get();
152    }
153
154    private void addPrefs(ConfigurationUpdate updEvt, String path,
155            Config config) {
156        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
157        Map<String, Object> toFlatten = new HashMap<>();
158        for (var e : config.entrySet()) {
159            if (isNode(e.getKey()) && e.getValue() instanceof Config) {
160                addPrefs(updEvt, ("/".equals(path) ? "" : path)
161                    + "/" + e.getKey().substring(1), e.getValue());
162                continue;
163            }
164            if (e.getValue() instanceof Config) {
165                toFlatten.put(e.getKey(), toValueMap(e.getValue()));
166            } else {
167                toFlatten.put(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
168            }
169        }
170        for (var e : flatten(toFlatten).entrySet()) {
171            updEvt.add(path, e.getKey(), e.getValue());
172        }
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Merges and saves configuration updates.
177     *
178     * @param event the event
179     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
180     */
181    @Handler(dynamic = true)
182    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CognitiveComplexity", "PMD.NPathComplexity",
183        "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
184        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
185    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event)
186            throws IOException {
187        if (event instanceof InitialConfiguration) {
188            return;
189        }
190
191        boolean changed = false;
192        for (String path : event.paths()) {
193            if ("/".equals(path) && event.values(path).isEmpty()) {
194                // Special case, "remove root", i.e. all configuration data
195                config.clear();
196                changed = true;
197                continue;
198            }
199            if (handleSegment(config, new StringTokenizer(path, "/"),
200                event.structured(path).map(ConfigurationStore::flatten))) {
201                changed = true;
202            }
203        }
204        if (changed) {
205            config.save();
206        }
207    }
208
209    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
210    private boolean handleSegment(Config config,
211            StringTokenizer tokenizer, Optional<Map<String, Object>> values) {
212        if (!tokenizer.hasMoreTokens()) {
213            // "Leaf" map
214            return mergeValues(config, values.get());
215        }
216        boolean changed = false;
217        var nextSeg = tokenizer.nextToken();
218        var usSel = List.of("_" + nextSeg);
219        var slashSel = List.of("/" + nextSeg);
220        if (!tokenizer.hasMoreTokens() && values.isEmpty()) {
221            // Selected is last segment from path and we must remove
222            for (var sel : List.of(usSel, slashSel)) {
223                if (config.get(sel) != null) {
224                    // Delete sub-map.
225                    config.remove(sel);
226                    changed = true;
227                }
228            }
229            return changed;
230        }
231        // Check if sub config exists
232        Object subConfig = Optional.ofNullable(config.get(usSel))
233            .orElse(config.get(slashSel));
234        if (!(subConfig instanceof Config)) {
235            // Doesn't exist or is of wrong type, new sub-map
236            changed = true;
237            subConfig = config.createSubConfig();
238            config.set(usSel, subConfig);
239        }
240        // Continue with sub-map
241        return handleSegment((Config) subConfig, tokenizer, values) || changed;
242    }
243
244    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
245        "PMD.CognitiveComplexity" })
246    private boolean mergeValues(Config config, Map<String, Object> values) {
247        boolean changed = false;
248        Map<String, Object> curValues = flatten(toValueMap(config));
249        for (var e : values.entrySet()) {
250            if (e.getValue() == null) {
251                // Delete from map (and config)
252                if (curValues.containsKey(e.getKey())) {
253                    curValues.remove(e.getKey());
254                    changed = true;
255                }
256                continue;
257            }
258            Object oldValue = curValues.get(e.getKey());
259            if (oldValue == null || !e.getValue().equals(oldValue)) {
260                curValues.put(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
261                changed = true;
262            }
263        }
264        if (changed) {
265            for (var itr = config.entrySet().iterator(); itr.hasNext();) {
266                if (!isNode(itr.next().getKey())) {
267                    itr.remove();
268                }
269            }
270            addFromMap(config, structure(curValues));
271        }
272        return changed;
273    }
274
275    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
276    private void addFromMap(Config config, Map<String, Object> map) {
277        for (var e : map.entrySet()) {
278            var selector = List.of(e.getKey());
279            if (e.getValue() instanceof Map) {
280                Config subConfig = config.get(selector);
281                if (subConfig == null) {
282                    subConfig = config.createSubConfig();
283                    config.set(selector, subConfig);
284                }
285                addFromMap(subConfig, (Map<String, Object>) e.getValue());
286            } else {
287                config.set(selector, e.getValue());
288            }
289        }
290    }
291}
